prompt: You are part of a team implementing the evaluation module internationalization. Check your mailbox for task assignments.

api-message-i18n.description: Update API response messages to return localized content
requirements: Detect user's locale from request headers
Return localized error and success messages

implementation_notes.message_loading: Import and use server-side translation functions
implementation_notes.fallback_strategy: Default to English if locale not supported

date-time-formatting.description: Implement localized date and time formatting for evaluation data
requirements: Format creation and completion dates according to locale
Handle different date formats (MM/DD/YYYY, DD/MM/YYYY, etc.)
Localize time display and time zones
Format numbers and percentages according to locale
Apply formatting in both API and frontend

server_i18n_patterns.error_responses: Include localized message in error responses

formatting_considerations.number_formats: Use Intl.NumberFormat for numbers and percentages
formatting_considerations.time_zones: Consider time zone handling for date displays
